about_the_game:
Unlocks 18+ Adult Only Content for Live Empire 2.

All the characters are 18+.
When the intimacy reaches a certain level, there will be a special plot. After that, the secret room function will be turned on. You can interact intimately with the characters in the secret room.

content_descriptors.notes: There are adult content in love house. Please watch it carefully.
